claim: Charlie Rubin has written speeches for the president.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He has played a national policy role in eight U.S. presidential election campaigns and written speeches for more serous candidates for president of the United States  (  13  )  than anyone else in US history , including 3 U.S. Presidents and 4 Vice Presidents , plus Secretaries of State and Defense , senators , representatives and other political figures .
